summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Ruffner Street from 40th Avenue West to Arapahoe Place; and certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 15916 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
